events.message: I recently ordered a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund and return the product as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back due to sizing issues.
The support agent Emily has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello, I’m Emily from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if you still have the original packaging for the return process?
My order number is 123456789, and yes, I have the original packaging unopened and ready to send back.
Thank you for the information. We will send you a prepaid return label and once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid label, it makes things much easier.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund today. You should see the amount credited on your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been completed and you have not reported any further issues, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your support experience regarding the refund process. Your feedback is valuable to us.
